module.name: part_view_definition
module.name.french: Définition de la vue de la pièce
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of characterization views of a version of a part.

inscope.li: identification of a characterization of a version of a part, relevant in one or more application domains and one or more life-cycle stages;

items within the scope of application module Product view definition, ISO/TS 10303-1019.
